For three years Dania has lived with her parents and works with them in agriculture. She is also a volunteer teacher in the local kindergarten. As she took a course in beauty when she was in Villanueva, she now also earns her living as a hair stylist

Part of the land Dania farms was a present from her father and part was in exchange for a vehicle. She grows coffee in one section and another part involves working with her father and younger brother. They work there in the mornings while she stays behind and takes them breakfast and lunch. Once the coffee beans are harvested she sells them to a local person who buys, processes, and sells the product to specialist coffee stores in the town.

Dania is seeking a loan to buy manure and special food for the coffee plants so that production increases in the forthcoming season, and to hire laborers to help her look after the plants. Her goals are to have a house of her own in the community, become well-established, and start projects she has in mind: raising chickens and fish, and having a vegetable garden.

loans.use: Buy agricultural supplies for her coffee plants in the upcoming season

loans.name: Samean's Group

texts.en: Samean, a young mother of one kid, is a local villager from Battambang province. To support the family, she works as a construction worker as her main source of income and has done that for ages. She has never been with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) before and she is a leader of two to get a new loan. Now, she and her co-borrower are requesting a loan of 600,000 KHR each. As a leader, she will use her entire loan portion to buy construction supplies so that she can have sufficient supplies to fulfill the demands of the ones who will hire her. She hopes that she can make more income to improve her living conditions and to send her kid to school.

loans.use: To buy construction supplies

location.town: Banteay Meanchey Province, Mongkul Borey District

loans.name: Maria Julia

texts.es:
María Julia tiene 53 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Oyotún, una comunidad de clima variado, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella tiene un restaurant donde ella misma prepara diversos platos como arroz con pato, tallarines con pollo, ají de gallina entre otros, por el buen sabor de sus preparos tiene una considerable clientela, has solicitado un préstamo de 4 500 nuevos soles para la compra de insumos para sus preparos y de esta manera preparar diversos platos para ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
María Julia, 53, lives with her spouse and children in the district of Oyotún, which has a varied climate. The local people work in agriculture, trade, and livestock. The district is located in the province of Chiclayo, which belongs to the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru.

She has a restaurant where she makes a range of dishes herself, such as duck with rice, chicken with noodles, ají de gallina (chicken with spicy sauce), and others. She has a considerable clientele due to the good flavor of her dishes. She has applied for a loan of 4,500 Peruvian nuevo soles to buy ingredients for her food preparations. She will then prepare a variety of dishes to offer her clients.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make food, such as bags of rice and oil.

loans.name: Alfredo

texts.es:
Alfredo tiene 64 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Zaña, una comunidad de clima variado, una comunidad cercana al valle del río Jetepeque, lo que le ha permitido desarrollarse mediante que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Junto a su esposa se dedican a la crianza de animales, como carneros, patos y pavos, desde hace cinco años, son una familia unida que se esfuerza en la labor que realizan, Alfredo ha solicitado un préstamo de 3 000 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados para engorde de sus animales y de esta manera ofrecerlos a un mayor precio.
texts.en:
Alfredo, 64, lives with his wife and children in the district of Zaña, which has a varied climate. The community is close to the Jetepeque river valley, which has allowed it to develop in agriculture, trade and livestock. It is located in the province of Chiclayo, which belongs to the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru.

Alfredo has made a living raising animals, such as sheep, ducks, and turkeys, for five years along with his wife. They are a united family who put effort into their work. Alfredo has applied for a loan of 3,000 Peruvian new soles to buy balanced feed to fatten his animals. He will then be able to sell them for a higher price.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed to fatten his animals.

loans.name: Elia

texts.es:
Carmen Elia tiene 38 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Morropon, una comunidad de clima variado, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia del mismo nombre que pertenece a la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de fertilizantes, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de variedad de fertilizantes para ofrecer a sus clientes y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Carmen Elia is 38 years old.  She lives with her spouse and children in the district of Morropon, a community with a varied climate.  Its populace works in farming, commerce, and livestock and it is located in the province of the same name, which is part of the Piura Region on Peru's northern coast. 

She sells fertilizers for a living.  Her business is located in her home.  She has requested a loan of 1,000 nuevos soles to buy a variety of fertilizers to sell to her customers, which will generate better income for her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers to sell to her customers

loans.name: Dalia Luz

texts.es:
Dalia Luz tiene 40 años de edad, vive en el distrito de Cayalti, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella tiene una tienda donde se dedica a la venta de cerveza, también se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores como cerdos y patos, es una madre emprendedora, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de animales menores para posteriormente engordarlos y ofrecerlos a un mayor precio.
texts.en:
Dalia Luz is 40 years old, and she lives in the district of Cayaltí, a community that works in agriculture, trade, and livestock-raising. It is located within the Province of Chiclayo that belongs to the Lambayeque Region on the northern coast of Peru.

She has a store where she sells beer, and she also works raising and selling small animals such as pigs and ducks. She is an enterprising mother, and she has requested a loan of 1,000 Nuevos Soles for the purchase of small animals, in order to fatten them up and offer them for sale at a higher price.

loans.use: to purchase small animals in order to fatten them up and offer them for sale at a higher price.

loans.name: Ma. Lourdes

texts.en:
Ma Lourdes is 54 years old and married with six children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, eggs, noodles, soap, etc.

Ma Lourdes has borrowed and repaid 11 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 10 years and earns additional income from pig fattening.

She aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, eggs, noodles, and soap

loans.name: Leandro

texts.es: En las partes bajas de la Cuidad de Dos Pisos, Boaco encontramos mesetas, cerros áridos y pedregosos, resaltando al norte el río Malacatoya, excelente para el desarrollo de la actividad a que se dedica el Señor Leandro de 37 años de edad, el cual dedica su vida a la siembra de maíz, frijoles, trigo hace más de 13 años; gracias a un crédito que obtuvo en KIVA logro hacer que se negoció creciera y la distribución de su producción; Solicita un nuevo crédito para la compra de nuevas semillas (frijol, maíz, trigo), abonos orgánicos y la compra de un nuevo terreno para una mayor producción y poder abastecer a muchos mercados locales; estimando que siempre un nuevo crédito le será de mucha ayuda para el crecimiento de negocio; obteniendo como planes futuros la  exportación de sus productos a mercados internacionales.
texts.en:
In the lowlands of the city of Dos Pisos, Boaco we find arid and rocky hillsides jutting out to the north of the Malacatoya river.  It is an excellent place for Leandro, age 37, to work at his business activity.  For over 13 years he has been devoting his life to growing corn, beans, and wheat.  

Thanks to a loan that he got from Kiva, he managed for his business to grow and to distribute his production.  He is requesting a new loan to buy new seeds (bean, corn, wheat), organic fertilizer, and a new piece of land for greater production.  He will do this to be able to stock many of the local markets.  He believes that a new loan will always be very helpful for the growth of the business.  His future plans are to export his products to international markets.

loans.use: to buy new seeds (bean, corn, wheat), organic fertilizer, and a new piece of land for greater production.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Rebecca is 43 years old, married and has three children, two of which are in school. 

She is in the agricultural business of pig fattening in the Philippines. Rebecca requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Rebecca has been in pig fattening for 8 years now, and has borrowed 13 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Rebecca would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Koeurn's Group

texts.en: Koeurn, 35, is a single resident from the Moung Russey district of Battambang province. To support her living, she does rice farming on four hectares as the main source of income and has a paid working job for extra income. She has been with this current business for 10 years and it has returned her a decent income. She has never been with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) before and she is a leader of two. She and her co-borrower are requesting a loan of 1,000,000 KHR each. As a leader, she will manage her loan portion to buy fertilizer, rice seeds and insecticide for her farmland. She hopes that her rice produces a better yield than before.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, rice seeds and insecticide

loans.name: Saroeurt's Group

texts.en: Saroeurt, 49, is a rural villager from Battambang province and a mother of six children. Currently, two of her children are under her responsibility. To make a living, she does paddy rice cropping as the main source of income on three hectares of farmland. This current business has earned her 25,000 KHR per day. Saroeurt has been with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) for her past six loans and she has fully repaid them. The loans have positively impacted her family in a gradual way as she can now cover the basic needs of her family and buy some household appliances. Now, she is a group leader of two to get a new loan. She and her group member are requesting a loan of 1,400,000 KHR each. As the leader, she will spend her loan portion to buy rice seeds and fertilizer and to pay for plowing fees. She strongly hopes that her business will improve so that she will be able to save some money for her family.

loans.use: To buy rice seeds and fertilizer and to pay plowing fees.

location.town: Banteay Meanchey Province, Mongkul Borey District

loans.name: Sokea's Group

texts.en:
Sokea is aged 26 and married with one son. Her family lives in a village of the Moung Russey district of Battambang province. She and her husband earn a living through farming rice and working for others for a fee. She is able to earn about 46,000 KHR per day to meet their family’s needs.

Sokea is the existing client of VisionFund who has received loans for three cycles. The past loans have helped her family relieve their financial burden to a great extent. She is now leading a group of two members to apply for another loan with VisionFund. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy fertilizers for her farmland and use a portion of it for land plowing and labor. With this loan, she hopes to increase her crop production and sell the harvest for a good price to make her living better.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her farmland and to use a portion of it for land plowing and labor

loans.name: Gonzalo

texts.es: Gonzalo es casado y tiene dos hijos, tiene casa propia en La Paz. Gonzalo se gana la vida elaborando calzados de mujer y los vende de forma ambulante puesto que no cuenta con puesto fijo Gonzalo necesita credito para comprar cuero y cuerina para sus trabajos de zapateria
texts.en:
Gonzalo is married and has two children.  He has his own house in La Paz.  Gonzalo earns a living making women’s shoes.  He sells them in an itinerant manner because he does not have a fixed stand.

Gonzalo needs a loan to buy leather and faux leather for his shoe-making work.

loans.use: to buy leather and faux leather for his shoe-making work.

loans.name: Homero

texts.es:
Homero tiene 21 años de edad, vive junto a sus padres en el caserío El Pueblo Lo Hizo, una zona rural del distrito de Santo Tomás, una comunidad de clima variado y abundante vegetación, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Cutervo que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la cría y comercialización de ganado vacuno contando a la fecha con 4 cabezas de ganado vacuno (dos vacas y dos terneros) de su propiedad, tiene amplia experiencia en actividad con más de 5 años, su ganado lo oferta en plaza de ganado de su distrito, también se dedica a la agricultura especialmente al cultivo de café.

Es un joven emprendedor ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 500 nuevos soles para la compra de ganado pequeño, con ello obtendrá mayores ingresos para así poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Homero is 21 years old. He lives with his parents in the village of El Pueblo Lo Hizo, a rural area of the Santo Tomás district, and a community with a varied climate and abundant vegetation. Its population works in agriculture, commerce and livestock. It is located in the province of Cutervo, which belongs to the Cajamarca region, in the northern mountains of Peru.

He works at raising and selling bovine cattle. At this time, he has 4 head of bovine cattle (two cows and two calves) that belong to him. He has ample experience in the business, more than 5 years. He sells his cattle at the stockyard in his district. He also works in agriculture, especially coffee growing.

He is a young entrepreneur and has requested a loan of 1,500 new soles to buy small livestock. That way he will get more income and be able to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: To buy small livestock, fatten them and sell them at a better price.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cookies, candy, and chocolate, among others.

loans.name: Marcela

texts.es: Marcela es casada, tiene dos hijos, ella vive en El Alto en una casa de ladrillo y cemento pero en condiciones de anticretico (una forma de pago de renta por adelantado) Marcela se dedica a la venta de ropa Marcela necesita credito para incrementar el monto de su anticretico para poder seguir viviendo en la casa en la que esta bastante comoda Por el momento, Marcela es la unica fuente de ingresos en su hogar por lo que necesita su ayuda
texts.en: Marcela is married and has two children.  She lives in El Alto in a house made of brick and cement, but it is on the basis of "anticretico" (a form of rent paid in advance).  Marcela sells clothing for a living.  Marcela needs a loan to reach the full amount of her rent so she can keep living in her home where she is very comfortable.  At the moment, Marcela is the only source of income in her household, which is why she needs this help.

loans.use: to reach the amount of her rent so she can continue to live in her rented home.

loans.name: Juan Evangelista

texts.es:
Juan Evangelista tiene 59 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Querocotillo, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Cutervo que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la cría y venta de animales menores, patos, pollos, gallinas, cerdos, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en la parte posterior a su domicilio, su esposa le apoya en esta labor, son una familia unida, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 500 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados para engorde de sus animales y de esta manera ofrecerlos a un mejor precio a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Juan Evangelista is 59 years old, and lives with his wife and children in the district of Querocotillo, located in the province of Cutervo of the Cajamarca region in the northern mountains of Peru. 

The community where he lives is dedicated to agriculture, commerce and stockbreeding. He works in the breeding and sale of small animals (ducks, chickens, hens, pigs). His business is located at the back of his house, and he counts with his wife’s help. They are a united family, and he’s now requesting a loan of 1500 PEN to buy balanced feed for animal growth. With this he will sell them for a better price.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed for animal growth.

loans.name: Channarin's Group

texts.en:
Channarin is a mother of four children residing in Moung Kul Borey district of Banteay Meanchey. For the sake of the entire household, she is involved in rice farming and a grocery selling business. In this way she is able to generate a decent income. 

This is not the first cycle for either her or her joint borrower with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner).  She has fully repaid her past loan and it has improved her quality of life. In this cycle, she is borrowing as part of a group of two. She and her joint-borrower are requesting the same amount of 2,000,000 KHR each. As the leader, she will spend her loan portion to buy more grocery items to resell. She hopes to earn extra income and to expand her business to a larger scale.

loans.use: to buy more grocery items to resell

location.town: Banteay Meanchey Province, Mongkul Borey District

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy ingredients such as rice, meat, leaves, vegetables, oil and condiments.

loans.name: Cherli

texts.es: Cherli, de 39 años, está casada y tiene 3 hijos con quienes vive en la casa de su madre. Cherli tiene como actividad económica la venta de productos comestibles, ofrece todo tipo de verduras, tubérculos, arroz, azúcar, pan, huevos, entre otros. Adquiere su mercadería comprando al por mayor en el mercado principal de la ciudad y ya en su establecimiento se encarga de distribuirlos a precio unitario. Lleva cerca de 2 años en este negocio y le está yendo muy bien, tiene una buena cartera de clientes y eso le ayuda a tener siempre buenas ventas y obtener considerables ganancias económicas, recibe el apoyo de su hija mayor. Le gusta mucho su trabajo ya que puede estar en contacto frecuentemente con sus clientes, lo que no le gusta es que a veces las personas se retrasan en sus pagos, pero aprendió a ser muy paciente y al final siempre consigue que le paguen el monto total que le adeudan y además la experiencia le ha enseñado a reconocer a todo tipo de clientes. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 2000, por tanto agradece la oportunidad y confianza que ponen en ella para recibir éste crédito, por otro lado se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado comprará mayor cantidad de abarrotes como arroz, azúcar, pan, aceite, leche entre otros.
texts.en:
39-year old Cherli is married and has three children. They live in her mother's house. She earns her living selling food products such as all kinds of vegetables, tubers, rice, sugar, bread, and eggs. Cherli buys the goods wholesale in the main market of the town and then sells them in smaller quantities from her stall. She's had her business for two years and is doing very well. She has a fine group of customers so she sell lots and has good profits. Her oldest daughter helps in the store.

Cherli really enjoys her works she is in frequent contact with her customers. The part she doesn't like is when people are late with their payments, but she has learned to be very patient. In the end they always pay the full amount they owe. The experience has also taught her to recognize the various types of customer.

At this time she is seeking a loan of S/. 2,000. She is grateful for this opportunity and the trust that is placed in her. She promises to make the repayments punctually. With the loan money she plans to buy a larger quantity of groceries such as rice, sugar, bread, oil, and milk.

loans.use: Buy food items such as rice, sugar, bread, oil, milk etc.

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es:
María Isabel, tiene 20 años de edad, ella es estudiante de la carrera de Contabilidad, paralelamente trabaja como Asistente Contable y Administrativo en una empresa de transporte. Su mayor anhelo es terminar pronto su carrera profesional y ser exitosa en los proyectos laborales que se le presenten.
María Isabel está iniciando su tercer ciclo en la universidad, su mayor motivación son sus padres quienes se han esforzado mucho siempre por brindarle lo necesario para que ella pueda estudiar.
El préstamo recibido lo invertirá en el pago de mensualidades de la universidad y también para cubrir algunos gastos de pasajes.
texts.en:
María Isabel, age 20, is an accounting student.  She also works as an accountant and administrative assistant for a transportation company.  Her biggest desire is to quickly finish her professional education and to be successful in the work projects that she encounters.

María Isable is starting her third cycle at the university.  Her parents are her greatest motivation.  They have always puts forth great effort in order to provide her with what she needs to be able to go to school.

She will use the loan to make her monthly payments to the university.  She will also cover some of her transportation expenses.

loans.use: to make her monthly payments to the university for the new cycle.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.en:
As a married parent of nine children, Lucia works hard to support her family.

She has a business making dried fish in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Lucia is borrowing 10,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional fish to make dried fish.

Lucia has been sustaining her business activities through her past loan from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional fish to make dried fish

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy dressmaking materials such as fabrics, thread, elastics, lace, needles and buttons.

loans.name: Liezel

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Liezel works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buying and selling dried fish.  Liezel is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy fishing net to make fish cages for her fishing business.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her past loan from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fishing net to make fish cages

loans.name: Elizabeth Guadalupe

texts.es:
Por la calles transitadas de carros y caballos en Boaco, se encuentra caminando junto a sus dos hijos de 11 y 14 años, Elizabeth de 36 años, una mujer morena, de cabello negro y ojos oscuros, ojos que transmiten cansancio, pues ha pasado casi seis horas caminando con una caja de cartón y un bolso colorido entre sus trabajadas manos, donde guarda ropa nueva y algunos frascos de perfumes que le quedan del mes pasado para su venta del día.
Desde los 28 años, esta madre soltera quien debe sustentar la educación de sus hijos, encontró su pasión por ser comerciante y decidió hacer crecer su trabajo mediante los prestamos MiCrédito-KIVA. La noche cae, Elizabeth junto a los dos adolescentes se dirigen a su casa caminando a la par de la esperanza de que mañana crecerá más y tendrá su propio tramo en el mercado gracias al dinero que va ahorrando, y así ver a sus hijos sostener sus diplomas de la universidad tal como ellos lo sueñan. Solicita el crédito para comprar: Blumeres, Calcetines, Colchas y perfumes.
texts.en:
On the streets traveled by cars and horses in Boaco, we find 36-year-old Elizabeth walking with her two children, who are 11 and 14.  She is a dark-skinned woman with black hair and dark eyes.  These eyes convey tiredness, as she has spent nearly six hours walking with a cardboard box and a colorful bag in her tired hands, which contain new clothing and a few perfume bottles that are left over from last month for her to sell for the day.   

She has been a single mother since she was 28 years old and she has to pay for her children's education.  She discovered a passion for being a businesswoman and she decided to expand her work through MiCrédito-KIVA loans.  Elizabeth and her two adolescents are headed home walking with the hope that tomorrow her business will grow more and she will have her own section in the market thanks to the money she has been saving so she can see her children get university degrees like they've dreamed of.  She is requesting this loan to buy panties, socks, bedspreads, and perfumes.

loans.use: to buy panties, socks, bedspreads, and perfumes

loans.name: Elena

texts.en:
Elena is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a furniture-making business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 13,000 through NWTF to buy materials like wood, bamboo, paints, etc. for her furniture-making business.

Elena has been in this business for 3 years. Elena earns more income from food vending.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to buy materials like wood, bamboo, paints, etc

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and pay for labor to help with her coffee crops

loans.name: Azimboy

texts.ru:
Азимбой жизнерадостный и трудолюбивый мужчина  в возрасте 38 лет. Он женат и имеет 3-их детей. Он обратился в Арванд впервые, когда узнал, что есть возможность получить финансовую поддержку.  Сам Азимбой живёт со своей семьёй в сельской местности. Он не имеет высшего образования, так как не было возможности учиться в Университете из-за финансовых трудностей в семье. Жена Азимбоя также не имеет образования и является домохозяйкой, она занимается домашними делами и воспитанием детей.

Чтобы иметь доход на пропитание, Азимбой занимается своим бизнесом. Он занимается откормом и продажей крупного рогатого скота. Также Азимбой работает плотником в местной мастерской. От данного бизнеса он получает хороший доход. Жена также помогает Азимбою в его деле, она продаёт молоко, полученное от скота.  Сейчас Азимбой хочет увеличить количество скота для расширения своего бизнеса. Поэтому он обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку скота. Азимбой очень надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Azimboy is a cheerful and hardworking 38-year-old man. He is married and has three children. He turned to Arvand for the first time when he realized that there was the opportunity to receive financial support. Azimboy lives with his family in the countryside. He does not have a higher education, as he did not have the opportunity to study at university due to financial difficulties in his family. Azimboy's wife also does not have an education. She is a homemaker who does the household chores and raises their children.

In order to have an income to live on, Azimboy has his own business. He fattens up and sells cattle. He also works as carpenter in a local workshop. He receives a good income from this business. His wife also helps Azimboy with this business. She sells the milk received from the cows. Now Azimboy wants to increase the size of his herd to expand his business. This is why is requesting a loan from Arvand to buy cattle. Azimboy really relies on a positive outcome and thanks Arvand in advance for their financial support.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Vuthy's Group

texts.en: Vuthy is 51 years old and married with seven children; one of whom is still under her support and in school. Growing and selling cassava is the family's only source of income. On average, the family can save approximately US $5 a day; after netting off expenses. To grow good quality cassava, Vuthy decided to apply for her fifth loan with VisionFund. She will use her loan portion to buy fertilizers and pesticides. She will also reserve some amount of it to pay for labor fees for plowing and harvesting.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and pesticides and to pay labor fees

loans.name: Nasanbat

texts.en:
Mr. Nasanbat, who is 39 years old, lives with his wife and two daughters in Ulaanbaatar, capital city of Mongolia. 

He has been providing taxi service to local people since 2008, and before this work, he had used to inspect activities around the outdoor bazaar. His wife is an experienced saleswoman who has been working for a shop since 2008. Their elder daughter is a junior student at university while the younger one goes to high school. 

He is requesting a loan of 2,500,000 MNT to buy furniture such as drawers, closet and a sofa for his new home. His family is moving from a slum district into an apartment that is more comfortable and economical. The borrower is a very hardworking individual who strives for a better future.

loans.use: to buy furniture

loans.name: Sitora

texts.ru: Ситоре 23 года. Она трудолюбивая сельская женщина из района Носири Хусрав. Ситора замужем и является матерью двухлетнего ребенка. Ее муж сейчас находится в России для того чтобы работать и обеспечивать семью. Ситора тоже трудится в своем селе. У нее имеется орошаемый участок земли, на котором она сеит бахчевые культуры. Ситора занимается посевом урожая на протяжении 3 лет и уже хорошо освоила технику выращивания. Сейчас она планирует посадить арбуз. С такой целью Ситора обратилась за кредитом, на сумму которого собирается купить семена арбуза и минеральные удобрения. В будущем она хочет увеличить участок земли и разновидность выращиваемых культур.
texts.en: Sitora is 23 years old. She is a hardworking country woman from the Nosiri Khusrav District. Sitora is married and is a mother for a two-year-old child. Her husband currently works abroad in Russia in order to be employed and provide for the family. Sitora also works in her village. She has an irrigated plot of land on which she sows melons and gourds. Sitora has been sowing crops for the past three years and has already mastered the agricultural techniques. Now she plans to plant watermelons. With this goal, Sitora requested a loan to by watermelon seeds and mineral fertilizers. In the future, she wants to increase the size of her plot of land and the variety of her crops.

loans.use: to buy watermelon seeds and mineral fertilizers in order to carry out the spring sowing season.

loans.name: Juana Francisca

texts.es:
Juana de 64 años de edad, soltera  con hijos mayores de edad, es originaria de  Leon, lugar que está ubicado en la zona de occidente de la región. Se caracterizan por ser trabajadora, responsables, con ganas de superación personal. Lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos no pudo estudiar, y se vio en la necesidad de trabajar, para ayudar con los gastos de hogar. 
Gracias a su esfuerzo y sus ganas de salir adelante, tiene por actividad económica la venta de granos básicos en un lugar específico de unos de los mercados de la localidad. Productos como: aceite, arroz, frijoles, azúcar, jabón, cereales, cacao. Ella dedica a su negocio unas diez horas diarias ofreciendo su producto. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su negocio en la compra y venta de granos básicos, para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos. Juana agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva ofrecen a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
Juana is 64 years old, single, and has grown children.  She is originally from Leon, which is located in the western area of the region.  She is known for being hardworking, responsible, and for having a drive to better herself.  Unfortunately, she was unable to go to school because of a lack of financial resources and instead she had to work to help with the household expenses. 

Thanks to her hard work and desire to get ahead, she has a business selling staple products at a specific spot in one of the local markets.  She sells products such as oil, rice, beans, sugar, soap, cereal, and cacao.  She spends 10 hours a day at her business selling her products.  Her goal for this loan is to invest in working capital and to stock her business by buying and selling staple products so she will make better profits in the near future.  Juana is thankful for the help Kiva's lenders offer to people with limited resources and poor countries like Nicaragua so they can do respectable work.

loans.use: to invest in working capital and to stock her business by buying staple products, such as oil, rice, beans, sugar, soap, cereal, and cacao

loans.name: Eriberto

texts.es:
Eriberto tiene 49 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el Caserío de la Rinconada, una zona rural del distrito de Santo Tomás, una comunidad de clima variado y abundante vegetación, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Cutervo que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la agricultura especialmente al cultivo de caña de azúcar que lo ofrece a los moradores de su caserío para la destilación de aguardiente, una bebida tradicional de la sierra norte del Perú, también se dedica al cultivo de café de la variedad catimor, su esposa le apoya en esta labor, son una familia unida.

Eriberto ha solicitado un préstamo de 3 000 nuevos soles para la compra de una yunta que le permitirá trabajar en su trapiche para la destilación de aguardiente lo que le permitirá generar mayores ingresos.
texts.en:
Eriberto, age 49, lives with his wife and children in the small village of La Rinconada, a rural area of the district of Santo Tomás, located in the province of Cutervo in the Cajamarca region, in the northern mountains of Peru. 

This is a place of varied climate and lush vegetation, and the people there work in agriculture, commerce and stockbreeding. Eriberto works in agriculture, specifically in the cultivation of sugar cane, which he offers to the people in his village. They use it for the distillation of aguardiente, a typical beverage of the northern mountains of Peru. He also works in the cultivation of coffee (Catimor variety). Since he has a united family, his wife helps him with his labor. 

Eriberto is requesting a loan of 3000 PEN to buy a yoke that he will use to work in his trapiche (a press) for the distillation of aguardiente. This will allow him to generate more incomes.

loans.use: to buy a yoke.

loans.name: Yvonie

texts.en:
Yvonie is 41 years old and married with seven children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional items to sell like soft drinks, bread, chips, etc.

Yvonie has borrowed and repaid 18 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for nine years and earns additional income from raising pigs and selling vegetables and fruits.

She aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional items to sell like soft drinks, bread, and chips

loans.name: Sok's Group

texts.en: Originally from Battambang province, Sok is 54 years old and a father of six of children. To endure his family’s hardship, he grows rice as the main source of income. He has been involved in his current business for 10 years. This is the first microloan for Sok and his joint borrowers in the group of three with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). The total amount of his entire group's loan is 2,300,000 KHR; 1,000,000 KHR is his loan portion. As a leader, he will use his loan portion to buy fertilizer, rice seeds and insecticide and to pay for plowing fees for his rice farmland. He strongly hopes that his rice will produce a better yield and increase his family’s income.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, rice seeds and insecticide and to pay plowing fees

loans.name: Erick Yandry

texts.es:
Erick es un joven trabajador de 21 años, soltero vive junto a sus padres en la ciudad de Santo Domingo de los Colorados, una ciudad muy comercial del Ecuador, conocida por la etnia Tsachila que habita en el sector.
Erick desde hace un año se dedica al comercio de queso, vende en las tiendas del sector, recorre en triciclo visitando a su clientela tres días a la semana. El compra queso en recintos y trae para distribuir a sus clientes el rico queso de finca. Erick comenzó de a poquito este negocio, ahora ya tiene clientes fijos, pero con lo que no cuenta es con el suficiente dinero para comprar un congelador que necesita para abastecerse de más producto ya que ahora también va a vender en el mercado de la ciudad. Por ello Erick acudió a Fundación Alternativa, conoció a la institución a través de referencias del sector, ahora Erick se siente muy feliz ya que con este crédito él podrá comprar el congelador necesario para almacenar más cantidad de queso. Erick agradece a Fundación Alternativa y a Kiva por esta oportunidad de desarrollar mejor su trabajo y salir adelante.
texts.en:
Erick is a hardworking young man of 21.  He is single and lives with his parents in the city of Santo Domingo de los Colorados, a very commercial city in Ecaudor that is known for its local population of Tsachila people.  

For a year now Erick has had a cheese business.  He sells to stores in the area and he takes his tricycle to visit his customers three days a week.  He buys cheese from outlying areas and brings this delicious farm cheese back to sell to his customers.  Erick started his business little by little.  Now he has steady customers, but what he needs is enough money to buy a freezer, which he needs to stock up on more product as he is now also going to sell at the city market.  This is why Erick went to Fundación Alternativa.  He learned of the institution through references from the area and now Erick is very happy, as this loan will allow him to buy the freezer he needs to store greater quantities of cheese.  Erick thanks Fundación Alternativa and Kiva for this opportunity to better carry out his work and get ahead.

loans.use: to buy a freezer

loans.name: Nodira

texts.ru: Нодира 36-летняя учительница из района Носири Хусрав, которая одновременно еще и занимается растениеводством. Это ремесло она изучила у своего свёкра и уже занимается земледельческой деятельностью в течение 5 лет. Нодира живет с двумя детьми у свекра и свекрови. А муж временно находится на заработках в России. Нодира работает усердно. Она преподает в школе, и после занятий она приходит домой и еще работает на грядке. Сейчас она готовится к посеву. Нодира уже провела вспашку земли и подготовила почву для посева. Теперь она просит кредит, чтобы она смогла купить хлопковые семена и посадить хлопок. Она нуждается в вашей поддержке.
texts.en: Nodira is a 36-year-old teacher from the Nosiri Khusrav District. She also practices crop farming simultaneously. She learned this trade from her father-in-law and has already been practicing crop farming for the past five years. Nodira lives with her two children at the house of her father-in-law and mother-in-law. Her husband is temporarily working abroad in Russia. Nodira works diligently. She teaches in a school and then after her classes, she comes home and works even more in the garden beds. Now she is preparing for the sowing season. Nodira already tilled the land and prepared the fields for sowing. Now she is requesting a loan so that she can buy cotton seeds and plant cotton. She needs your assistance.

loans.use: to buy cotton seeds for planting cotton.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy more little chicks and poultry feed.

loans.name: Nheours' Group

texts.en:
A 59-year-old citizen of the Mongkul Borey district of Banteay Meanchey province, Nheours is a farmer who grows beans as her main source of income. She is a married mother blessed with six children, one of whom is in school. She also earns extra income from a business producing palm sugar to supplement her income. She has been in this business for 11 years, and it has enabled her to earn up to 20,000 riels (KHR) per day.

Including this loan, Nheours is a third-time borrower with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She has repaid her past loan completely, and it helped her to upgrade her lifestyle better than before– especially, she can keep her kids in school. Now she is seeking a new loan with VisionFund. She is a leader of four. She and her joint borrowers are requesting loans for a total amount of 3,500,000 KHR, of which 1,000,000 KHR is her portion. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to pay for labor costs and to buy fertilizer and bean seeds for her farmland. She hopes to get a good yield so she can support her kids to study until tertiary level.

loans.use: To pay for labor costs and to buy fertilizer and bean seeds

location.town: Banteay Meanchey Province, Mongkul Borey District

loans.name: Salma

texts.en: Salma is a 45-year-old married woman who lives with her husband and four children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband owns an electric generator shop in which he sells generators to the people. He has been doing this work for many years. To carry out his work, he has to stay at the shop to deal with the general public. He wants to buy more generators to cope with demand but due to the high cost, he is unable to purchase them. Therefore, Salma requested a loan to support her husband's business. She hopes that with the loan, her husband will be able to carry out his plans. She promises to make the payments on time. Salma requested a loan so that her husband can buy additional generators to enhance his business. Salma thanks Kiva and field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy more generators for resale

loans.name: Ancelmo

texts.es:
Detrás de una mirada cansada, Ancelmo de Teustepe, Boaco, esconde su espíritu luchador, pues a sus 42 años de edad, sigue brindando a la comarca Bramadero uno de los mejores cultivos de la zona. Además, el apoyo de su esposa y tres hijos, hacen de los 22 años dentro de la tierra bendecida por la agricultura,  tener el conocimiento exacto de lo que necesitan sus clientes para seguir avanzando. 
Rodeado de sacos blancos llenos de maíz, frijol y trigo, planea su siguiente objetivo con el préstamo MiCrédito-KIVA, ya que su mayor deseo es incrementar su producción, seguir creciendo profesional y personalmente. Solicita el préstamo para la compra de 2 hectáreas de tierra. Planea seguir incrementando su producción y así llegar a comprar vacas y herramientas para mejorar las condiciones físicas y sanitarias de su potrero.
texts.en:
Behind his tired look, Ancelmo de Teustepe of Boaco conceals his fighting spirit. At 42 years of age, he still offers the Bramadero region one of the best crops in the zone. Moreover, the aid of his wife and 3 children has helped make of his 22 years ploughing the earth an agricultural blessing. Ancelmo knows exactly what his customers need to keep on advancing.

Surrounded by white sacks filled with corn, beans, and wheat, Ancelmo plans his next objective with the MiCredito-Kiva loan. His major desire is to expand his production and to continue his professional and personal growth.

Ancelmo is requesting this loan to purchase 2 hectares of land. He plans to continue expanding his production and, thus, reach the point where he can buy cattle and the farm tools needed to improve physical and sanitary conditions on his ranch.

loans.use: to buy 2 hectares of land.

loans.name: Maria Genoveva

texts.es:
María Genoveva tiene 28 años de edad, vive en el distrito de Cayaltí, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la preparación de de alimentos como cebiche, tallarín, papa rellena entre otros, por el buen sabor de sus preparos tiene una clientela considerable ha solicitado un préstamo de 500 nuevos soles para la compra de insumos para la preparación de sus alimentos para ofrecer a sus clientes una variedad de platos.
texts.en:
María Genoveva, age 28, lives in the district of Cayaltí, a community dedicated to agriculture, commerce, and stockbreeding. It is located in the province of Chiclayo, which belongs to the Lambayeque region, in the northern coast of Peru. 

She sells prepared food, like ceviche, noodles, stuffed potatoes, and others. Thanks to her great tasting food, she has a lot of customers. She is requesting a loan for 500 PEN to buy inputs for her business. She wants to offer her clients a variety of dishes.

loans.use: to buy inputs for the preparation of food.

loans.name: Norcamar

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Norcamar works hard to support her family.

She has a business farming coconuts in the Philippines and earns additional income from buying and selling fish.  Norcamar is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies for her farming of coconuts business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and now requests a new loan to further build her business.

Norcamar has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Elsie

texts.en:
Elsie is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fishing business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 14,000 through NWTF to purchase additional bundles of fish net for her fishing business.

Elsie has been in this business for 12 years. Elsie earns more income from buying and selling dried fish.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional bundles of fish net

loans.name: Lucio Humberto

texts.es:
Lucio tiene la edad de 35 años, actualmente esta acompañado, su compañera de vida se dedica a la venta de tamales de elote y a la venta de pan. Tienen un pequeño Bebe de 9 meses de edad.

Lucio se dedica a la compra y venta de elotes desde hace aproximadamente 5 años, anteriormente trabajaba con un amigo y luego comenzó a independizarse y hacerse de su propio negocio. 

En esta temporada de verano es cuando esta la cosecha de el elote de humedad y es aquí donde Lucio quiere aprovechar para comprar suficiente Elotes para abastecer a los clientes. Ademas, de la compra que él realiza su compañera de vida se dedica a hacer tamales para vender en esto ella aporta en los ingresos para su familia. 
Él a futuro desea tener un carro para transportarse y así poder mejorar su negocio, ademas poder contribuir en los estudios de su pequeño para que sea un profesional y un hombre de bieN.
texts.en:
Lucio is 35 years old.  He is currently in a relationship.  His partner works selling corn tamales and bread.  They have a little nine-month-old baby.

Lucio has worked buying and selling corn for about five years.  Previously he worked with a friend, and then he started to work alone and build his own business.

The summer season is when the tender sweet corn is harvested, and now Lucio wants to take advantage of this to buy enough corn to supply his customers.  Also, from the purchase he makes, his partner makes tamale to sell.  In this way she supports the family income.

In the future, Lucio wants to have a car to get himself around and thus improve his business.  Additionally, he could support his little one in his studies so that he can become a professional and a man of means.

loans.use: to buy corn

loans.name: Loern's Group

texts.en:
Loern, 50, is married with seven children residing in a rural village located in the Battambang province’s Moung Russey district, Cambodia. For the last several years, she has been farming rice as the primary source of her family’s income. The current business earns her about 35,000 KHR per day to meet the family’s needs.
 
Loern has been with VisionFund for one cycle and completely paid back her past loan, which helped her better support her family. Now, leading her group to apply for a loan, Loern, who is the leader, will use her portion to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to make more income from her business to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland

loans.name: Umida

texts.ru:
Умида жизнерадостная и ответственная женщина. Она замужем и имеет двоих детей. Вместе со своей семьёй Умида живёт в сельской местности. Сама Умида работает в дехканском хозяйстве. А муж Умиды работает продавцом на местном рынке. Они очень любят своих детей, и стараются обучать их от всего своего сердца, потому что они желают видеть образованных детей. Но зарплата, которую они получают, недостаточна для покрытия всех имеющихся нужд в семье. Поэтому вместе с мужем они имеют дополнительный бизнес. 

Умида, вот уже несколько лет сотрудничает с Арванд. Она получала кредит на потребительские нужды, а также на развитие своего бизнеса. Умида говорит, что после того, как она начала сотрудничать с Арванд, качество её жизни стало постепенно улучшаться. В данное время Умида вместе со своим мужем хотят отремонтировать дом, где они живут, чтобы улучшить условия для проживания. Но собственных средств у них недостаточно. Для этого Умида обратилась в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку строительных материалов для ремонта дома. Она надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Umida is a cheerful and responsible woman. She is married and has two children. Umida lives in the countryside with her family. Umida works on a farm. Umida's husband works a salesperon at the local market. They love their children a lot and strive to education them with all of their hearts. They want to see their children educated. However, the salary which they receive is not enough to cover all of the family's current needs. This is why she and her husband have an additional business.

Umida has been partnering with Arvand for several years already. She received a loan to spend on consumer goods and also to develop her business. Umida says that after she started partnering with Arvand, her quality of life began to gradually improve. Currently, Umida and her husband want to renovate the home where they live in order to improve their living conditions. However, their personal funds are not enough for this. This is why Umida requested a loan from Arvand to buy construction materials to renovate her house. She relies on a positive outcome and thanks Arvand in advance for their support.

loans.use: to buy building materials to renovate her house.

loans.name: Altangerel

texts.en: Mrs. Altangerel, 44 years old, lives with her husband in Erdenet, third largest city of Mongolia. She began working as an assistant teacher at kindergarten in 2013. Her husband is an experienced welder who has worked since 1992 at a mining company. Their son currently studies at a university in Korea. She is requesting a loan of 2,800,000 MNT to buy a natural gas vehicle. The advantage of a natural gas vehicle is that it emits less smoke and wastes less fuel. She will use her car for transportation as she and her husband are getting older and it is becoming hard to travel on public transport such as buses and microvans, which are usually crowded with many people.

loans.use: to buy a natural gas vehicle

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase wholesale fish and materials for her business.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
El aire puro de la comarca Las cañitas de Teustepe, Boaco, nos regala la bienvenida a la finca del sonriente e inspirador, Don Francisco de 67 años de edad, quien no deja de mostrar con orgullo los 52 años de trabajo que ha logrado como agricultor y ganadero.
Don Francisco, pudo no haber conocido el colegio, pero sin duda aprendió a trabajar en el campo, a cultivar maíz, frijoles y trigo, a comprar vacas y así vender la leche, a motivarse a salir adelante con su esposa y sus 8 hijos, y a servir de ejemplo para todas las personas, pues a pesar que ya se siente autosuficiente quiere seguir invirtiendo en su trabajo. Con el préstamo MiCrédito-KIVA, sueña con comprar dos vaquillas y adecuar su finca para mejorar las condiciones de salud- vida de su familia y de su ganado, el cual duerme debajo de los frondosos árboles que Don Francisco ha plantado.
texts.en:
The pure air of the Las Cañitas region of Teustepe, Boaco, welcomes us to the farm of the smiling and inspirational Don Francisco, age 67.  In 52 years of work that Don Francisco has logged as a farmer and a rancher, he hasn’t stopped showing his pride.

Don Francisco didn’t manage to go to school, but without a doubt he learned how to work in the fields—to grow corn, beans, and wheat; to buy cows and sell their milk; and to motivate himself to get his wife and eight children ahead.  He serves as an example for everyone, for in spite of already being self-sufficient, he continues to want to invest in his work.  With this MiCrédito-Kiva loan, he dreams of buying two heifers and making adaptations on his farm to improve the health and living conditions of his family and his herd, which sleeps under the leafy trees that Don Francisco has planted.

loans.use: to buy two heifers.

loans.name: Ros' Group

texts.en:
Ros, 53, is a widowed mother of five children, one of whom is in school. She lives in the Ponhea Krek district of Kampong Cham province. She is the one who feeds all her kids via cassava farming and her paid working job. She has engaged in this business for ages. She can earn about 40,200 riels (KHR) per day.

Now Ros is seeking a loan with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She is a second-time borrower. She is requesting a loan of 1,400,000 KHR and her co-member is applying loan for 1,200,000 KHR. As the leader, she will spend her portion of the loan to buy fertilizer for her cassava. She hopes to get a better yield than last year.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for her cassava

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Karla Vanessa

texts.es: Karla, tiene 38 años de edad, es madre soltera de 2 hijos en edad escolar, ella es Lic. en relaciones internacionales pero, por la falta de empleo empezó con el pequeño negocio de pulpería, gracias al apoyo de su madre. Este es su primer crédito que solicita para invertir comprando productos básicos para el negocio y así poder ofertar más productos a su clientela.
texts.en: Karla is 38 years and is the single mother of two school-aged children. She has a college degree in international relations, but due to a lack of employment she started a small grocery store business, thanks to her mother's support. This is the first loan she has requested to invest in buying basic products for the business and in this way she will be able to offer more products to her customers.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, dairy products, meats, cereals, vegetables and oil, among other items.

loans.name: Angeline

texts.en:
As a married parent of one child, Angeline works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buying and selling ready-to-wear. Angeline is borrowing 20,000 Philippines Pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy more items to sell like canned goods, coffee, eggs, noodles, and other items for her general store business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and now requests a new loan to further build her business.

Angeline has been sustaining her business activities through her past 8 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell like canned goods, coffee, eggs, noodles, and other items.

loans.name: Dzame

texts.en:
Dzame is married and has six children, all of whom are in school. She lives in her own house that neither has electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are school fees and household consumables.

For over six years, she has operated a tailoring business, making garments and curtains. She cites seasonality as her major challenge. 

With the loan, she wants to purchase cloth materials and sewing thread for her business. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase cloth materials and sewing thread for her business

loans.name: Tania Liliana

texts.es:
Tania es una señora de 19 años, vive junto a su esposo Luis, con quien tiene una nena, la pequeña aun pasa con ellos ya que tiene 2 añitos. Viven en Santo Domingo de los Colorados, una ciudad con clima agradable, conocida en el Ecuador porque en ella habita la etnia Tsachila. 
Tania es una joven muy trabajadora, desde hace dos años se dedica a la venta de ropa ambulante, ella recorre a recintos con la compañía de su esposo, se han dedica a este negocio ya que su suegro les donó un terreno y poco a poco con estas ganancias han podido construir su vivienda, aun no terminada en su totalidad pero viven ahí.
Su esposo Luis también se dedica al servicio de pintura, el recibe obras y pinta según el contrato, esta actividad es eventual su fuerte es el negocio de la ropa.
Tania se vio en la necesidad de adquirir un crédito ya que necesita capital para la compra de blusas, camisas, pantalones  ya que van a abrir mercado en otros recintos y tienen que invertir. Acudió a Fundación Alternativa y se le pudo ayudar, se siente feliz ya que gracias a Kiva y la institución podrá crecer en su negocio y por ende mejorar su casita.
texts.en:
Tania is a 19-year-old woman.  She lives together with her husband, Luis, with whom she has a little girl.  Her little one still stays with them, because she is only two years old.  They live in Santo Domingo de los Colorados, a city with a lovely climate, known in Ecuador because the Tsachila ethnic group lives there.  

Tania is a very hardworking young lady.  For two years now she has worked as a mobile clothes vendor.  She passes through the neighborhoods in the company of her husband.  They work at this business because her father-in-law has given them a plot of land, and little by little, with these earnings they have been able to build their home.  The home isn’t completely finished, but they live there.

Her husband Luis also works as a painter.  He gets jobs and paints by contract.  This work is sporadic; their strength is the clothing business.

Tania recognizes the need to get a loan because she needs capital to buy tops, shirts, and pants, because they are going to begin selling in other neighborhoods and they have to invest.  She turned to Fundación Alternativa, which was able to help her.  She is happy because, thanks to Kiva and this organization, she will be able to expand her business and, in the end, improve her little home.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise, such as tops, shirts, and pants.

loans.name: Sandra Isabel

texts.es: Sandra de 32 años de edad dedica a la agricultura, a la siembra de maíz y frijol. Se ha dedicado a esta actividad durante varios años y es así como se gana el pan de cada día. Ella es una mujer  trabajadora, responsable y muy conocida en la zona por su enorme corazón y amabilidad para con los demás. Debido a que ya es temporada de siembra tomo la decisión de comenzar a prepararse. Es por esa razón que ha decidido solicitar este nuevo crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de semillas, abonos, insecticidas, fertilizantes, etc. y mejorar el terreno donde desea realizar la siembra que es el que muestra en la fotografía, lo que más desea es que su cosecha sea abundante y mejor que las anteriores, ya que esta es la forma en que ella consigue el sustento para su familia.  Confía en Dios que con su ayuda, su dedicación y empeño en el  trabajo lograra el sueño de mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Sandra, age 32, works in agriculture, planting corn and beans. She has worked at this job for several years and this how she earns a living each day. She is a hardworking woman, responsible and well known in her area for her enormous heart and friendliness to those around her. Since it is already planting season, she decided to start preparing herself. That is why she has decided to request this new loan from INTEGRAL to invest in purchasing seeds, manure, insecticides, fertilizers, etc. and improve the land where she wants to plant, which is what she is showing in the photograph. What she wishes for most is an abundant harvest, better than the ones before, since this is how she provides for her family. She trusts in God that, with his help, and her dedication and determination in her work, she will achieve her dream of improving the quality of life of her family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, insecticide, fertilizer, etc.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es: Isabel de 50 años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y su hija, ella es una mujer luchadora y responsable para que a su familia no le falte lo necesario para la subsistencia. Actualmente trabaja vendiendo comida cerca de su lugar de residencia  desde hace 20 años tiene mucha clientela fija pues da a un buen precio el plato de comida, Isabel desea ampliar su puesto es decir comprar mesas, sillas, mas materia prima como arroz, carne, pollo, frutas, verduras, etc. para variar su menú y tener un poco de mas entrada económicamente, pero no cuenta con los suficientes ingresos para esta inversión, es por eso que solicita un crédito para comprar lo dicho; y asi obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia lo necesario sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Isabel, age 50, lives with her companion and her daughter.  She has been a hardworking and responsible woman so that her family lacks for nothing they need to live.  

Currently, she works selling food near her place of residence.  She has been doing this for twenty years.  She has a lot of regular customers because she charges a good price for a plate of food.  

Isabel wants to enlarge her stand, that is to say, buy tables, chairs, and more ingredients such as rice, meat, chicken, fruit, vegetables, etc., to vary her menu and have a little more coming in, financially.  She doesn’t have enough income for this investment, and so because of this she is asking for a loan to buy the aforementioned items.  In this way, she can get better earnings to give her family what they need without any restriction.

loans.use: to buy tables and chairs, and more ingredients such as rice, meat, chicken, fruit, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.en:
Rosario is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a general store business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 24 years. Rosario earns additional income from farming rice and buying and selling fermented fish.

Rosario has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of loans from Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF). She successfully paid back her previous loan and now requests a new loan to further build her business. Rosario is borrowing 24,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy more stock to sell, such as dried fish, rice, vegetables, sugar, canned goods, and other groceries for her general store business. She dreams of saving money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell, such as dried fish, rice, vegetables, sugar, canned goods, and other groceries

loans.name: Nuon's Group

texts.en:
Nuon is a villager from the Koh Sotin district of Kampong Cham province. She is 38 years old and has five children who are still under her responsibility. Three of her kids are in school, and the two remaining are too young for schooling. 

To earn a living, she grows rice, corn, and sesame as the main source of income. Apart from this current business, she works as a paid-worker to earn more income. She has been with this business for ages and it has generated her a profit of 36,100 Cambodia Riel (KHR) per day. 

Nuon has never been with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) before. Now, she and her joint borrower are seeking to get a new loan. She is seeking 800,000 KHR, while her co-borrower is applying for 900,000 KHR. 

As a leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy pesticides, sesame, and corn seeds. She hopes to improve her business on a larger scale than before.

loans.use: To buy pesticides, sesame, and corn seeds

location.town: Kampong Cham Province, Koh Sotin District

loans.name: Malohat

texts.ru: Малохату 44 года. Она уроженка района Спитамен вблизи городка Худжанд, северной столицы Республики Таджикистан. Малохат замужняя женщина. Малохат в течение многих лет занимается земледелием. Она на не большом земельном участке выращивает кукурузу и ячмень. Дополнительно она занимается шитьем национальной одежды. Малохат энергичная женщина и хочет преуспеть в новой деятельности. Она решила получить кредит и начать бизнес в сфере животноводства. Малохат на заемные деньги купит бычков и телят, и начнет бизнес. Она верит, что ее ждет удача, и деятельность животноводства будет процветать.
texts.en: Malohat is 44 years old. She is a native of the Spitamen District, close to the town of Khujand, the northern capital of the Republic of Tajikistan. Malohat is a married woman. Over the course of many years, Malohat has practiced crop farming. She grows corn and barley on her small plot of land. Additionally, she sews ethnic Tajik-style clothing. Malohat is an energetic woman and wants to succeed in her new business. She decided to take out a loan and start a business in the field of livestock breeding. With the borrowed money, Malohat will buy bull calves and calves and start her business. She believes that good luck awaits her and that her livestock breeding business will flourish.

loans.use: to buy bull calves to start her livestock breeding business.

loans.name: Loeurp's Group

texts.en:
Loeurp is a resident from Moung Russey district of Battambang province. She is married and blessed with three dependent children. To strive for a living, she is involved in rice farming on one-and-a-half hectares of land as her main source of income. She also earns extra income via paid jobs. She has been involved in this business for eight years and it has returned her about 29,400 KHR per day. 

This is the sixth-cycle loan for her with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner).  Her past loan, which she has fully repaid has enabled her to increase her standard of living. Now, she leads a group of two to get a new loan. She is requesting a loan for 1,400,000 KHR and her co-borrower is applying for a loan of 1,200,000 KHR. As a leader, she will spend her entire loan to pay for a plowing fee and to buy fertilizer and pesticides for her crop. She hopes to gain a good yield to increase her income.

loans.use: to pay for a plowing fee and to buy fertilizer and pesticides for her crop

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es: Miguel de 61 años de edad se dedica desde hace 10 años a la venta de colchas, sabanas, hamacas y frazadas, vende de forma ambulante por las diferentes colonias y mercados que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra salir adelante con los gastos que se le presentan en el hogar, vive solo en casa propia ya que sus hijos viven en casas separadas con sus familias, Miguel esta solicitando un crédito para poder comprar mas mercadería por mayor y poder seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos.
texts.en: Miguel is 61 years old and has made a living by selling quilts, sheets, hammocks and blankets for the last ten years. He sells in an itinerant fashion in the various neighborhoods and markets near his home. With what he obtains from his sales he is able to get ahead with the expenses he has at home. He lives by himself in a house he owns, as his children live in separate houses with their families. Miguel is requesting a loan to be able to buy more merchandise wholesale and to be able to continue with his work, as this is his only source of income.

loans.use: to buy quilts, sheets, hammocks and blankets wholesale

loans.name: Thol's Group

texts.en:
A citizen from Moung Russey district of Battabang province, Thol is 60 years old and a married father blessed with six children. Nowadays, he still needs to support his three dependent kids who remain in school. To secure decent food for his household, he grows various kinds of cash crops including rice, chilies, pineapple, and soybeans. It is the business that he has occupied for ages and it has returned him about 27,000 KHR per day.  

This is not the first loan for Thol with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). The successful repayment of his past loan has enabled him to increase his standard of living. As the leader, he will spend his entire loan portion to buy good seedlings and fertilizer for his crop. He strongly believes that he can earn more income from his business with the higher yield that he will gain.

loans.use: to buy good seedlings and fertilizer for his crop

loans.name: Sulhija

texts.ru: Сулхия живет в джамоате Кулкент. Ей 25 лет. Образование у нее среднее. Очень увлекается чтением художественной литературы.  Мама Сулхии на пенсии, её братья для того чтобы улучшить материальное положение семьи находятся в трудовой миграции в России. Сулхия не смотря на то что братья  содержат семью не сидит  без  дела.  Вот уже несколько лет она  шьет  женскую национальную одежду на заказ.  Её услуга пользуется спросом среди женского населения села.  Её очень уважают односельчане так как Сулхия с любовью относится к своему занятию и прикладывает всё свое умение , что конечно сказывается на результате её труда.  Сулхия  на протяжении трех лет сотрудничает с «Арванд» и благодарна ,  что при необходимости снова может обратиться за помощью .  Для развития своего бизнеса она хочет взять кредит и приобрести   швейную машину с функциями вышивания.
texts.en: Sulhija lives in the Kulkent jamoat (municipality). She is 25 years old and has a secondary education. She really enjoys reading fiction-genre literature. Sulhija's mother is retired. Her brothers are labor migrants in Russia in order to improve the financial situation of their family. Despite the fact that her brothers are supporting her family, Sulhija does not sit idly. For several years already, she has been sewing ethnic Tajik clothing on a by-order basis. Her services are in demand amongst the female population of her village. Her fellow villagers really respect her as Sulhija treats her work with love and applies all of her knowledge so that, of course, it shows up in her work as a result. Sulhija has partnered with Arvand over the course of three years and is grateful she is able to turn to them for help when she needs to. She wants to take out a loan to develop her business and buy a sewing machine capable of embroidery.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente de 29 años de edad se dedica a realizar viajes en su vehículo por las diferentes colonias, posee muchos clientes que lo prefieren porque es muy responsable para manejar, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos, el cliente está solicitando un crédito para la compra de repuestos y darle mantenimiento a su vehículo ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y asi poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
The client at 29 years of age is dedicated to making trips in his vehicle through the different communities. He has many customers that prefer to use him because he is a very responsible driver. From his work, he manages to settle some of his home costs and live in his own house with his life companion and their two children. 

The client is requesting a loan for the purchase of spare parts and to maintain his vehicle as it is his only source of work, and this way he can give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts and maintain his vehicle.

loans.name: Bunafsha

texts.ru: Бунафша жизнерадостная и целеустремленная женщина. Она опытная портниха и шьёт красивые платья. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 1 ребенка. С целью обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами 4 года назад она начала свой бизнес шитьем женской одежды. Бунафша является основным кормильцем семьи, так как ее муж трудовой мигрант в Российской Федерации и имеет маленький доход. Ее муж несколько месяцев назад вернулся в Таджикистан и теперь должен уехать обратно в Россию, но не имеет денег для покупки авиабилета. Бунафша запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони для покупки авиабилета для ее мужа в Россию. Она надеется на вас и вашу доброту.
texts.en: Bunafsha is a cheerful and goal-driven woman. She is an experienced seamstress who sews beautiful dresses. She is married and is raising one child. In order to provide her family with all of the necessities, she started her own business of sewing women's clothing four years ago. Bunafsha is the main provider in her family, as her husband is a labor migrant in the Russian Federation and has a small salary. Her husband returned to Tajikistan several months ago and now needs to leave for Russia again, but he does not have the money to buy an airline ticket. Bunafsha is requesting a loan for 5000 somoni to buy an airline ticket for her husband to go to Russia. She relies on you and your kindness.

loans.use: to buy an airline ticket to Russia for her husband.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta de 19 años de edad vive con su hija en casa de los suegros y su esposo vive en estados unidos y le ayuda con los gastos del hogar. Ella posee una venta de ropa tiene de diferentes estilos y  para todas las personas damas, caballeros, niños y niñas, la ropa que comercia es de muy buena calidad y la vende a precios accesibles es por eso que se ha hecho de mucha clientela últimamente; La clienta es muy activa siempre se encuentra trabajando luchando por salir adelante. Para ella el propósito y coraje que le pone a su labor tiene una dirección ver crecer el negocio para lograr un mejor futuro, es por eso que se decidió solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa en variedad como faldas, pantalones, blusas, camisetas, trajes etc. Así siempre podrá satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes. La clienta  tiene la esperanza que de esta forma lograra darle a su familia seguridad económica y una vida plena.
texts.en:
The client is 19 years old and lives with her daughter in the house of her in-laws. Her husband works in the USA and helps with the household expenses. She sells different styles of clothing for everyone including women, men, girls and boys. The clothing she sells is of high quality and the prices are affordable so lately she has increased her clientele. The client is very active always looking for ways to get ahead.

For her the purpose and courage she puts into her labor gives the momentum to expand her business to obtain a brighter future. For this reason she has decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL to allow her to buy a variety of clothing like skirts, pants, blouses, t-shirts, suits, etc. Then she can satisfy the needs of her customers. The client hopes that in this way she can manage to provide her family with economic security and a plentiful life.

loans.use: to buy skirts, pants, blouses, t-shirts, suits, etc.

loans.name: Ricardo Hermogenes

texts.es:
Ricardo tiene 70 años de edad, es viudo, estudio hasta primer grado, es padre de 5 hijos los cuales con mucho esfuerzo Ricardo les dio estudio y los finalizaron. 

Ricardo se dedica a la agricultura a los 18 años, para darles una educación a sus hijos él aprendió el trabajo de la agricultura de su padre. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar 3 novillos de repasto, los cuales los engordara y al vencimiento de su préstamo los venderá para cancelar el crédito y así adquirir ganancias para los ingresos de sus familia.

Ricardo sueña con mejorar su condición de vida y que su trabajo le produzca mas beneficios y poder ofrecerle un futuro mejor a sus nietos e hijos.
texts.en:
Ricardo is 70 years old and studied up to Grade 1. He is the father of 5 children who through a lot of effort saw them through their schooling and graduation. Ricardo has been a farmer for 18 years. He learned this from his father and used it to provide an education for his children.

The loan he is requesting is to buy 3 calves which he will fatten and at the end if his loan term will sell to pay off the loan. In his way he will make money for his family. Ricardo dreams of improving his living conditions and that his labor produces more benefits. Then he can offer a better future for his grandchildren and children.

loans.use: to buy 3 young calves.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es: Manuel de 45 años de edad se dedica a trabajar como jardinero en diferentes casas, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra cubrir los gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, vive en casa propia con su esposa, Manuel está solicitando un crédito para la compra de gasolina y aceite  para la maquina cortadora de grama que es la que muestra en la fotografía y asi poder seguir con su trabajo para poder tener junto con su esposa una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Manuel is 45 years old. He works as a gardener at different homes. He manages to pay his household expenses with what he makes. He lives with his wife in his own home.

Manuel is requesting a loan to buy gasoline and oil for his lawn mower, which appears in the photo. Then he can continue his work and together with his wife enjoy a higher standard of living.

loans.use: to buy gasoline and oil for his lawn mower.

loans.name: Alpha

texts.en:
